value.title: Set Power BI Data Color   All Visuals to Follow Same Color for the Same Data Point

However, what if you want to set the same color for the same data point? For example, You want the Gender Female to be always colored Orange in all the charts and visuals.

value.title: Computing rolling average in DAX
value.excerpt: Computing the rolling 12-months average in DAX looks simple, but it hides some level of complexity.  This article explains how to write the best formula and how to avoid common pitfalls using time intelligence functions. Article and download: https://sql.bi/15161?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt

value.title: Design a data¬†model¬†in Power BI¬†
value.excerpt: The process of creating a complicated data model in Power BI is straightforward. If your data is coming in from more than one transactional system, before you know it, you can have dozens of tables that you have to work with. Building a great data model is about simplifying the disarray. A star schema is one way to simplify a data model, and you‚Äôll learn about the terminology and implementation of them in this module. You will also learn about why choosing the correct data granularity is important for performance and usability of your Power BI reports. Finally, you‚Äôll learn about improving performance with your Power BI data models.

value.title: Use Apache Spark in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Apache Spark is a core technology for large-scale data analytics. Microsoft Fabric provides support for Spark clusters, enabling you to analyze and process data at scale.

value.title: Avoid refresh errors when importing files in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns. value.title: What is this delta lake thing?
value.excerpt: You may be using a lake for your data and it may just be regular parquet files. In this video, Stijn joins us to explain why you should be using a delta lake instead and how this works in Azure Synapse Analytics.  Connect with Stijn https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  What is Delta Lake https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/spark/apache-spark-what-is-delta-lake
